item.title: Make it say Owner when you ::yell?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“kniveslives, post:17, topic:159418”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=217089.msg1889374#msg1889374 date=1195649857]
else if(command.startsWith(“yell”)) {
String toYell = command.substring(4);
String title = “”;
if(playerRights >= 3) {
title = "[OWNER]: ";
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = title + playerName + " " + toYell;
} else {
title = "[PLAYER]: ";
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = title + toYell;
}
}
[/quote]

Thank you, I made my own changes to what you said to add, and now it works just like I want it to, thanks for your time and somewhat patience :P. +[/quote]
Your welcome.

Read full topic

Okay, I had another yell command hidden in my source, I deleted it and it works, I can set it to it doesn’t say just “[player]” when a player talks right? if so, can you tell me how? I think I already know, but I want to be sure before I screw something up, I’ll surely rep++

item.title: Make it say Owner when you ::yell?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Sorry; mistype; try this.

else if(command.startsWith("yell")) { String toYell = command.substring(4); String title = ""; if(playerRights >= 3) { title = "[OWNER]: "; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = title + toYell; } else { title = "[PLAYER]: "; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = title + toYell; } }

item.title: Make it say Owner when you ::yell?
item.dc:creator: @kniveslives kniveslives
item.description:
@kniveslives wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:4, topic:159418”]My way;

else if(command.startsWith("yell")) { String toYell = command.substring(4); String title = ""; if(playerRights >= 3) { title = "[OWNER]: "; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = title + toYell; } else { titles = "[PLAYER]: "; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = titles + toYell; } }[/quote]

When I enter that in, I get the following errors,

client.java:13679: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable titles
location: class client
titles = “[PLAYER]:”;
^
client.java:13680: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable titles
location: class client
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = titles + toYell;
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
2 errors
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

Any ideas?

Read full topic
item.source: Make it say Owner when you ::yell?

item.title: Make it say Owner when you ::yell?
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Or… the shortest/neatest way:

else if(command.startsWith("yell"))
{
     String x = playerTitles[playerRights], v = command.substring(5);
     PlayerHandler.messageToAll = x+" "+playerName+": "+v;
}

Then add this new method:

public String[] playerTitles = {
     "[PLAYER]",
     "[MOD]",
     "[ADMIN]",
     "[OWNER]
};

Read full topic

item.title: Make it say Owner when you ::yell?
item.dc:creator: @kniveslives kniveslives
item.description:
@kniveslives wrote:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) {

String playerTitle = “”;
if(playerRights == 3) playerTitle = “[Owner]”;

						if(playerRights == 2)	playerTitle = "[Administrator]";
						
						if(playerRights == 1)	playerTitle = "[Moderator]";

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerTitle+""+playerName+": "+command.substring(5);
}

Maybe that will help, I have that, but I don’t think that alone does it, I got that one from…Exile Scape I believe.

Read full topic
item.source: Make it say Owner when you ::yell?

item.title: Make it say Owner when you ::yell?
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Hey, I have this so far…

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5)
{

command.substring(5).replaceAll(“no-ip”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).replaceAll(“servegame”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).trim();

            if(muted == 1)
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
            else
	PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5);
} else {
(playerRights == 3)
{

command.substring(5).replaceAll(“no-ip”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).replaceAll(“servegame”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).trim();

            if(muted == 1)
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
            else
	PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Owner]" +playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5);
}}[/code]

So how? Its giving me 100 errors…

But I have another yell command…

} else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { if(muted == 1) sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!"); else PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5); } } else { (playerRights == 3) if(muted == 1) sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!"); else PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Owner]" +playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5); } }
